00041 struct ml_tlm2_delay_val {
00042   sc_time_unit tu;
00043   int delay_value;
00044 };
00045 
00051 class ml_tlm2_time_params {
00052  public:
00053   ml_tlm2_time_params() {};
00054   ml_tlm2_delay_val get_delay_struct(sc_time& delay) {
00055     static bool first = true;
00056     static sc_time_unit tu = SC_PS;
00057     static int mult;
00058     ml_tlm2_delay_val d;
00059     if(first) {
00060       first = false;
00061       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_FS)) {tu = SC_FS; mult = 1;};
00062       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_FS)) {tu = SC_FS; mult = 10;};
00063       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_FS)) {tu = SC_FS; mult = 100;};
00064       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_PS)) {tu = SC_PS; mult = 1;};
00065       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_PS)) {tu = SC_PS; mult = 10;};
00066       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_PS)) {tu = SC_PS; mult = 100;};
00067       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_NS)) {tu = SC_NS; mult = 1;};
00068       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_NS)) {tu = SC_NS; mult = 10;};
00069       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_NS)) {tu = SC_NS; mult = 100;};
00070       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_US)) {tu = SC_US; mult = 1;};
00071       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_US)) {tu = SC_US; mult = 10;};
00072       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_US)) {tu = SC_US; mult = 100;};
00073       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_MS)) {tu = SC_MS; mult = 1;};
00074       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_MS)) {tu = SC_MS; mult = 10;};
00075       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_MS)) {tu = SC_MS; mult = 100;};
00076       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(1, SC_SEC)){tu = SC_SEC; mult = 1;};
00077       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(10, SC_SEC)){tu = SC_SEC; mult = 10;};
00078       if(sc_get_time_resolution() == sc_time(100, SC_SEC)){tu = SC_SEC; mult = 100;};
00079     }
00080     d.tu = tu;
00081     d.delay_value = mult*delay.value();
00082     return d;
00083   }
00084 };
00085 
00086 static ml_tlm2_time_params* global_tp = new ml_tlm2_time_params;

00194 // Target connector 
00195 // adapter for propagating transactions from testbench to SC target
00202 template <class REQ, unsigned int BUSWIDTH, typename TYPES = tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types>
00203 class ml_tlm2_target_connector: public ml_tlm2_target_connector_base
00204   ,virtual public tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>
00205   {
00206     public :
00207     typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type transaction_type;
00208     tlm::tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES> isocket;
00209     
00210     // transaction mapping for nb calls
00211     bool disable_transaction_mapping;
00212     bool disable_transaction_mapping_set;
00213     std::string m_socket_name;
00214 
00215     // constructor
00216     ml_tlm2_target_connector(sc_module_name name_, tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH,TYPES> &s, std::string sname) :
00217     ml_tlm2_target_connector_base(sname),
00218     isocket("isocket"),
00219     disable_transaction_mapping(false),
00220     disable_transaction_mapping_set(false),
00221     m_socket_name(sname)
00222     {
00223       isocket(*this);
00224       isocket(s);
00225       is_target = true; 
00226       set_intf_name("TLM2");
00227       ml_tlm2_do_register_target(sname,name());
00228     }
00229     
00230     void b_transport(uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt, sc_time_unit *delay_unit, double *delay_value, sc_time_unit time_unit, double time_value) {
00231       tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp = 0;
00232 
00233       sc_time delay = sc_time(*delay_value, (sc_time_unit)*delay_unit);
00234 
00235       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, tlm_gp);
00236 
00237       // Extract tlm_gp
00238       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)tlm_gp;
00239 
00240       // Hold the generic_payload until transaction is completed
00241       //assert(tx->has_mm());
00242       if(!tx->has_mm()) {
00243         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: b_transport failed because the transaction has no memory manager","");
00244         return;
00245       };
00246       tx->acquire();
00247 
00248       // send a TLM2 transaction to the DUT
00249       isocket->b_transport(*(dynamic_cast<REQ *>(tx)), delay);
00250 
00251       // Reconstruct delay
00252       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00253       *delay_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00254       *delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00255 
00256       // Pack into ml packed object
00257       ml_tlm2_pack(*tlm_gp, &vt);
00258 
00259       tx->release();
00260     }
00261 
00262     tlm_sync_enum nb_transport_fw(uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt, tlm_phase_enum *phase, unsigned int transaction_id, sc_time_unit *delay_unit, double *delay_value, sc_time_unit time_unit, double time_value) {
00263       tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp = 0;
00264 
00265       sc_time delay = sc_time(*delay_value, (sc_time_unit)*delay_unit);
00266       tlm_phase fw_phase(*phase);
00267 
00268       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, tlm_gp);
00269 
00270       // map the transaction if needed
00271       set_transaction_mapping();
00272       if (disable_transaction_mapping == false) {
00273         if (*phase == BEGIN_REQ) {
00274           //assert (transaction_id != ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID);
00275           if(transaction_id == ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID) {
00276             UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: nb_transport_fw failed due to uninitialized transaction","");
00277             return TLM_COMPLETED;
00278           };
00279           ml_tlm2_map_transaction(tlm_gp, transaction_id);
00280         } else if (*phase == END_RESP) {
00281           // retrieve the original gp sent on the forward path
00282           transaction_type *mapped_trans = 
00283             dynamic_cast<transaction_type*>(ml_tlm2_get_transaction_by_id(transaction_id));
00284           if (!mapped_trans) {
00285             ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_fw",*phase);
00286           }
00287           // set the original gp in the current request. no fields are updated
00288           tlm_gp = mapped_trans; 
00289         }
00290       }
00291 
00292       // Extract tlm_gp
00293       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)tlm_gp;
00294 
00295       // Hold the generic_payload until transaction is completed
00296       //assert(tx->has_mm());
00297       if(!(tx->has_mm())) {
00298         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: nb_transport_fw failed because the transaction has no memory manager","");
00299         return TLM_COMPLETED;
00300       };
00301       tx->acquire();
00302 
00303       // send a TLM2 transaction to the DUT
00304       tlm_sync_enum ret = isocket->nb_transport_fw(*(dynamic_cast<REQ *>(tx)), fw_phase, delay);
00305 
00306       *phase = (tlm_phase_enum)((unsigned int)fw_phase);
00307 
00308       // Reconstruct delay
00309       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00310       *delay_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00311       *delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00312 
00313       // release mapped transaction
00314       if (disable_transaction_mapping == false) { 
00315         if (*phase == END_RESP || ret == TLM_COMPLETED) {
00316           bool result = ml_tlm2_release_transaction(tlm_gp, transaction_id);
00317           if (!result) {
00318             ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_remove_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_fw",*phase,ret);
00319           }             
00320         }
00321       }
00322 
00323       // Pack into ml packed object
00324       ml_tlm2_pack(*tlm_gp, &vt);
00325       
00326       if(tx->get_ref_count() != 0) {
00327         tx->release();      
00328       };
00329 
00330       return ret;
00331     }
00332 
00333     tlm_sync_enum nb_transport_bw(REQ& trans, tlm_phase& phase, sc_time& delay)
00334     {
00335       sc_time_unit delay_unit;
00336       double       delay_value;
00337       unsigned int transaction_id = ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID;
00338       tlm_generic_payload * t1 = 0;
00339 
00340       uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00341       uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00342 
00343       // copy original transaction id to outgoing transaction
00344       set_transaction_mapping();
00345       if (disable_transaction_mapping == false) {
00346         transaction_id = ml_tlm2_get_id_by_transaction(trans);
00347         if (transaction_id == ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID) {
00348           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_bw",phase);
00349         }
00350       }
00351 
00352       // Pack to ml packed object
00353       ml_tlm2_pack(trans, v);
00354 
00355       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00356       delay_value = delay_struct.delay_value;
00357       delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00358       tlm_phase_enum phase_id = (tlm_phase_enum) (unsigned int) phase;
00359 
00360       sc_time ct = sc_time_stamp();
00361       delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(ct);
00362 
00363       // Call testbench
00364       tlm_sync_enum ret = (tlm_sync_enum) uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_nb_transport_bw(conn_id, 
00365                                                                                              v, 
00366                                                                                              (unsigned int *)&phase_id,
00367                                                                                              transaction_id,
00368                                                                                              &delay_unit, 
00369                                                                                              &delay_value
00370                                                                                              );
00371 
00372       // update delay and phase
00373       delay = sc_time(delay_value, (sc_time_unit)(delay_unit));
00374       phase = phase_id;
00375 
00376       // Unpack ml packed object 
00377       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(v, t1);
00378 
00379       // Extract tlm_gp
00380       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)t1;
00381       tx->acquire();
00382 
00383       // Update transaction fields
00384       trans.set_address(tx->get_address());
00385       trans.set_response_status(tx->get_response_status());
00386       if(trans.is_read()) {
00387         ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(trans, *tx, m_socket_name);
00388       }
00389       trans.update_extensions_from(*tx);
00390 
00391       uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00392       tx->release();
00393 
00394       return ret;
00395     }
00396 
00397     unsigned int transport_dbg(uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt, sc_time_unit time_unit, double time_value) {
00398       tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp = 0;
00399 
00400       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, tlm_gp);
00401 
00402       // Extract tlm_gp
00403       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)tlm_gp;
00404 
00405       //assert(tx->has_mm());
00406       if(!(tx->has_mm())) {
00407         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: transport_dbg failed because the transaction has no memory manager","");
00408         return 0;
00409       };
00410       tx->acquire();
00411 
00412       // send a TLM2 transaction to the DUT
00413       unsigned ret = isocket->transport_dbg(*(dynamic_cast<REQ *>(tx)));
00414 
00415       // Pack into ml packed object
00416       ml_tlm2_pack(*tlm_gp, &vt);
00417 
00418       tx->release();
00419       return ret;
00420     }
00421 
00422     void invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(sc_dt::uint64 start_range, sc_dt::uint64 end_range){};    
00423 
00424 private:
00425   
00426     inline void set_transaction_mapping() {
00427       if (!disable_transaction_mapping_set) {
00428         disable_transaction_mapping = ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_disabled(m_socket_name);
00429         disable_transaction_mapping_set = true;
00430       };
00431     }
00432   }; // class ml_tlm2_target_connector

00436 // Initiator connector 
00437 // adapter for propagating transactions from SC initiator to testbench
00444 template <class REQ, unsigned int BUSWIDTH, typename TYPES = tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types>
00445 class ml_tlm2_initiator_connector: public ml_tlm2_initiator_connector_base
00446   ,virtual public tlm::tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>
00447   {
00448     public :
00449     typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type transaction_type;
00450     tlm::tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES> tsocket;
00451 
00452     // transaction mapping for nb calls
00453     bool disable_transaction_mapping;
00454     bool disable_transaction_mapping_set;
00455     std::string m_socket_name;
00456     
00457     // constructor
00458     ml_tlm2_initiator_connector(sc_module_name name_, tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,TYPES> &s, std::string sname) :
00459     ml_tlm2_initiator_connector_base(sname),
00460     tsocket("tsocket"),
00461     disable_transaction_mapping(false),
00462     disable_transaction_mapping_set(false),
00463     m_socket_name(sname)
00464     {
00465       tsocket(*this);
00466       s.bind(tsocket);
00467       ml_tlm2_do_register_initiator(sname,name());
00468       is_target = false; 
00469       set_intf_name("TLM2");
00470     }
00471     
00472     void b_transport(REQ& trans, sc_time& delay) {
00473       sc_time_unit delay_unit;
00474       double       delay_value;
00475       tlm_generic_payload * t1 = 0;
00476 
00477       // Pack transaction into ml packed object
00478       uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00479       uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00480 
00481       ml_tlm2_pack(trans, v);
00482 
00483       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00484       delay_value = delay_struct.delay_value;
00485       delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00486 
00487       sc_time ct = sc_time_stamp();
00488       delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(ct);
00489 
00490       // Call testbench
00491       uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_b_transport(conn_id, v, &delay_unit, &delay_value);
00492 
00493       delay = sc_time(delay_value, (sc_time_unit)(delay_unit));
00494      
00495       // Unpack ml packed object
00496       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(v, t1);
00497 
00498       // Extract tlm_gp
00499       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)t1;
00500       //assert(tx != NULL);
00501       if(tx == NULL) {
00502         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: b_transport failed because the transaction is NULL","");
00503         return;
00504       };
00505       tx->acquire();
00506 
00507       // update transaction fields
00508       trans.set_address(tx->get_address());
00509       trans.set_response_status(tx->get_response_status());
00510       if(trans.is_read())
00511         ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(trans, *(tx), m_socket_name);
00512       trans.update_extensions_from(*t1);
00513 
00514       uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00515 
00516       tx->release();
00517     }
00518 
00519     tlm_sync_enum nb_transport_fw(REQ& trans, tlm_phase& phase, sc_time& delay) {
00520       sc_time_unit delay_unit;
00521       double       delay_value;
00522       unsigned int transaction_id = ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID;
00523       tlm_generic_payload * t1 = 0;
00524 
00525       // map transaction if needed
00526       set_transaction_mapping();      
00527       if (disable_transaction_mapping == false) {
00528         // make sure transaction has a memory manager      
00529         if (!trans.has_mm()) {
00530           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_mm_error(m_socket_name);
00531         }
00532         if (phase == BEGIN_REQ) {       
00533           ml_tlm2_map_transaction(&trans, transaction_id);      
00534         } else if (phase == END_RESP /*|| status == TLM_COMPLETED*/) {
00535           transaction_id = ml_tlm2_get_id_by_transaction(trans);
00536           if (transaction_id == ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID) {
00537             ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_fw",phase);
00538           }
00539         }
00540       }
00541 
00542       // Pack to ml packed object
00543       uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00544       uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00545 
00546       ml_tlm2_pack(trans, v);
00547 
00548       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00549       delay_value = delay_struct.delay_value;
00550       delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00551       tlm_phase_enum phase_id = (tlm_phase_enum)(unsigned int)phase;
00552 
00553       sc_time ct = sc_time_stamp();
00554       delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(ct);
00555 
00556       // Call testbench
00557       tlm_sync_enum ret = (tlm_sync_enum) uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_nb_transport_fw(conn_id, 
00558                                                                                              v, 
00559                                                                                              (unsigned int *)&phase_id,
00560                                                                                              transaction_id,
00561                                                                                              &delay_unit, 
00562                                                                                              &delay_value
00563                                                                                              );
00564 
00565       phase = phase_id;
00566       delay = sc_time(delay_value, (sc_time_unit)(delay_unit));
00567 
00568       // Unpack ml packed object 
00569       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(v, t1);
00570 
00571       // Extract tlm_gp
00572       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)t1;
00573       tx->acquire();
00574 
00575       // Update transaction fields
00576       trans.set_address(tx->get_address());
00577       trans.set_response_status(tx->get_response_status());
00578       if(trans.is_read())
00579         ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(trans, *tx, m_socket_name);
00580       trans.update_extensions_from(*tx);
00581 
00582       // release transaction from map if needed
00583       if ((disable_transaction_mapping == false) && (phase == END_RESP || ret == TLM_COMPLETED)) {
00584         bool result = ml_tlm2_release_transaction(t1, transaction_id);
00585         if (!result) { // may have been removed already by target connector
00586           //ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_remove_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_fw",phase,ret);
00587         }
00588       }
00589 
00590       uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00591 
00592       tx->release();
00593       return ret;
00594     }
00595 
00596     tlm_sync_enum nb_transport_bw(uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt, tlm_phase_enum *phase, unsigned int transaction_id, sc_time_unit *delay_unit, double *delay_value, sc_time_unit time_unit, double time_value) {
00597       tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp = 0;
00598       transaction_type * actual_trans;
00599 
00600       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, tlm_gp);
00601       //assert(tlm_gp->has_mm());    
00602       if(!(tlm_gp->has_mm())) {
00603         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: nb_transport_bw failed because the transaction had no memory manager","");
00604         return TLM_COMPLETED;
00605       };
00606 
00607       // Extract tlm_gp
00608       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)tlm_gp;
00609 
00610       sc_time delay = sc_time(*delay_value, (sc_time_unit)*delay_unit);
00611       tlm_phase bw_phase(*phase);
00612 
00613       // if transaction is mapped, fetch original object
00614       if ((disable_transaction_mapping == false) && 
00615           (*phase == END_REQ || *phase == BEGIN_RESP)) {
00616         // retrieve the original gp sent on the forward path
00617         transaction_type *mapped_trans = 
00618           dynamic_cast<transaction_type*>(ml_tlm2_get_transaction_by_id(transaction_id));
00619         if (!mapped_trans) {
00620           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_bw",*phase);
00621         }
00622         
00623         // update original transaction with tx transaction fields
00624         ml_tlm2_bw_update_gp(*mapped_trans, *tx);
00625         // in case of a read transaction, need to copy the data as well
00626         if (mapped_trans->is_read()) {
00627           ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(*mapped_trans, *(tx), m_socket_name);
00628         }
00629         actual_trans = mapped_trans;                  
00630         // need to acquire then release the temp transaction to make sure memory is cleared
00631         tx->acquire();
00632         tx->release();
00633       } else {
00634         actual_trans = tx;
00635       };
00636 
00637       actual_trans->acquire();
00638 
00639       // send a TLM2 transaction to the DUT
00640       tlm_sync_enum ret = tsocket->nb_transport_bw(*(dynamic_cast<REQ *>(actual_trans)), bw_phase, delay);
00641 
00642       *phase = (tlm_phase_enum)(unsigned int) bw_phase;
00643 
00644       // Reconstruct delay
00645       ml_tlm2_delay_val delay_struct = global_tp->get_delay_struct(delay);
00646       *delay_value= delay_struct.delay_value;
00647       *delay_unit = (sc_time_unit)delay_struct.tu;
00648 
00649       // Pack into ml packed object
00650       ml_tlm2_pack(*actual_trans, &vt);
00651 
00652       // release transaction from map if needed
00653       if ((disable_transaction_mapping == false) && 
00654           (bw_phase == END_RESP || ret == TLM_COMPLETED)) {      
00655         bool result = ml_tlm2_release_transaction(actual_trans, transaction_id);
00656         if (!result) {
00657           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_remove_error(m_socket_name,"nb_transport_bw",bw_phase,ret);
00658         }      
00659       }
00660 
00661       actual_trans->release();
00662       return ret;
00663     }
00664 
00665     unsigned int transport_dbg(REQ& trans) {
00666       tlm_generic_payload *t1 = 0;
00667 
00668       // Pack to ml packed object
00669       uvm_ml_packed_obj* v = uvm_ml_utils::get_mlupo_from_pool();
00670       uvm_ml_utils::allocate_mlupo(v);
00671 
00672       ml_tlm2_pack(trans, v);
00673 
00674       // Call testbench
00675       unsigned ret = uvm_ml_tlm_trans::tlm2_transport_dbg(conn_id, v);
00676 
00677       // Unpack ml packed object
00678       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(v, t1);
00679 
00680       // Extract tlm_gp
00681       transaction_type * tx = (transaction_type *)t1;
00682       tx->acquire();
00683 
00684       // Update transaction fields
00685       trans.set_address(tx->get_address());
00686       trans.set_response_status(tx->get_response_status());
00687       if(trans.is_read())
00688         ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(trans, *tx, m_socket_name);
00689       trans.update_extensions_from(*tx);
00690 
00691       uvm_ml_utils::release_mlupo_to_pool(v);
00692 
00693       tx->release();
00694       return ret;
00695     }
00696     
00697     virtual bool get_direct_mem_ptr(REQ& trans, tlm::tlm_dmi& dmi_data) {
00698       return false; 
00699     }
00700 
00701 private:
00702   
00703     inline void set_transaction_mapping() {
00704       if (!disable_transaction_mapping_set) {
00705         disable_transaction_mapping = ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_disabled(m_socket_name);
00706         disable_transaction_mapping_set = true;
00707       };
00708     }
00709   }; // class ml_tlm2_initiator_connector

00713 template <class T = tlm::tlm_generic_payload>
00714     class ml_tlm2_analysis_port_connector: public ml_tlm2_connector_base, 
00715                                            virtual public tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T>
00716 {
00717 public:
00718     sc_export<tlm_analysis_if<T> > connector_export;
00719     std::string                    m_port_name;
00720 
00721     ml_tlm2_analysis_port_connector(sc_module_name name_, tlm_analysis_port<T> & p, string sname):
00722         ml_tlm2_connector_base(sname),
00723         connector_export("connector_export"),
00724         m_port_name(sname)
00725   {
00726       connector_export(*this);
00727       p.bind(connector_export);
00728       is_target = false;
00729       set_intf_name("tlm_analysis_if");
00730   }
00731 
00732   virtual void write( const T &t ) { 
00733       // Pack to ml packed object
00734       uvm_ml_packed_obj& v = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo();
00735 
00736       ml_tlm2_pack(t, &v);
00737       uvm_ml_tlm_trans::write(conn_id, &v);
00738   }
00739 };
00740 
00741 template <class T = tlm::tlm_generic_payload>
00742     class ml_tlm2_analysis_export_connector: public ml_tlm2_analysis_export_connector_base
00743   {
00744 public:
00745     tlm_analysis_port<T> connector_port;
00746     std::string          m_port_name;
00747 
00748     ml_tlm2_analysis_export_connector(sc_module_name name_, sc_core::sc_export<tlm::tlm_analysis_if<T> > & p, string sname):
00749         ml_tlm2_analysis_export_connector_base(sname),
00750         connector_port("connector_port"),
00751         m_port_name(sname)
00752     {
00753       connector_port.bind(p);
00754       is_target = true;
00755       set_intf_name("tlm_analysis_if");
00756     }
00757 
00758   virtual void write( uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt ) { 
00759       T * tlm_gp = 0;
00760       tlm_generic_payload * t = 0;
00761 
00762       ml_tlm2_unpack_create(&vt, t);
00763       if (t) {
00764           tlm_gp = dynamic_cast<T *>(t);
00765           connector_port.write(*tlm_gp);
00766       }
00767       else
00768         UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: failed to unpack an incoming transaction to a declared transaction type of analysis_export ",""); 
00769   }
00770   
00771 };
